bannerMessage: Travel before 20 September and get 20% off!

intro.heading: Discover the Colombian Costa Caribe
intro.text: Hike through the breath-taking beauty of <2>Tayrona National Park</2>, discover the mysterious <5>Lost City</5>, or refresh yourself in the river of <8>Minca</8>. Our variety of heartful accommodations in the city of Santa Marta are <11>your perfect home base.</11>
